question_text:
You have a Fabric workspace named Workspace1.

You plan to configure Git integration for Workspace1 by using an Azure DevOps Git repository.

An Azure DevOps admin creates the required artifacts to support the integration of Workspace1.

Which details do you require to perform the integration?

answers.A: the organization, project, Git repository, and branch
answers.B: the personal access token (PAT) for Git authentication and the Git repository URL
answers.C: the project, Git repository, branch, and Git folder
answers.D: the Git repository URL and the Git folder

discussion:
A
I've checked the Fabric: 
organization, project, Git repo, branch - mandatory, 
Git folder - optional

Correct is A

folder is important too, but option A is closer

A is correct
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/fabric/cicd/git-integration/git-get-started?tabs=azure-devops%2CAzure%2Ccommit-to-git#connect-to-a-workspace

This is correct
